DOC.detailed_description: Background : Balance deficit common low back pain . Current literature fail prove effectiveness routine back exercise improve balance back pain patient . No study concentrate balance training back pain patient . Objective : Compare balance exercise routine back exercise improve balance functional outcome . Procedure : Back pain patient attend physiotherapy department tertiary care teach hospital recruit voluntarily . Randomised either balance routine program base simple lottery method . Balance training comprise 5 exercise - single leg squat , dead lift , single leg raise , lateral step-up forward reach out . Routine back exercise include 5 set - pelvic bridge , dynamic dead bug , prone plank , situps , lateral plank . 10Repetition Maximum , 2 Sets/ day , five day week , 2 week . Baseline balance ( star Edward , berg balance ) functional test ( sit stand ) pain ( Visual analogue score ) post 2 week outcome score analyse pair unpaired within group .
